creditline: Gift of the artist in memory of Shelly Ross
description: irregular shape-long horizontal sheet with two small rectangular sheets extending downward; primarily red and white on R side, blue and white on L side; three images of hands at center over a simple house shape-black and grey
inscription:
Signature, Date, Title, Edition, Stamp

see Signed

Titled in pencil, LL: [meeting house]

Incribed in penicl, LR: [t.p.]
markings: Artist\'s monogram, stamped in red ink
medium: Color woodcut and collage on Japan paper
signed: LRC of central image, in pencil: [t.p./ on 8.26.1981/ Steven Sorman]; artist\'s monogram on top of signature, in red, stamped: [(square inside circle)]
title: Meeting House
